Overall, disappointed the President stuck to the old familiar script and missed the mark once again #SOTU
The #ObamaCare29ers provision is causing millions of hourly workers across the country to see their hours and wages cut.
The President should offer new solutions to improve current policies which are failing American, such as the 30-hour provision in #Obamacare
The President needs to embrace the bipartisan approach to #taxreform, not just reforms to the corporate code #SOTU
Disappointed that the President missed another opportunity to reach across the aisle & present broadly appealing solutions #SOTU
A modern tax code means #smallbiz to large companies can expand, hire & increase take-home pay for American workers
We need #TaxReform so we can lower tax rates for American families & grow the economy #SOTU
Policies that will lead to more jobs & higher wages: #TaxReform and #TPA4USJobs
The President should focus on how to strengthen the economy & create jobs for Americans #SOTU
Issues that need addressed: #Obamacare, our national debt, jobs & unemployment, #taxreform, and our economic recovery. #SOTU
The President needs to embrace this opportunity to reach across the aisle #SOTU
We need the President’s specific solutions to challenges facing our country, not the same old rhetoric #SOTU
I’m looking forward to the President’s #SOTU, hoping that he will give the American people the answers they deserve.
